name: Details
description: A collapsible disclosure widget that shows/hides content. Built on native HTML details/summary elements with enhanced styling and accessibility.

do: Use for progressive disclosure of secondary content
Use for FAQ sections and expandable panels
Provide a clear, descriptive summary label
dont: Don't hide critical information that users need immediately
Don't nest details within details more than one level deep
Don't use for primary navigation or main content

props.name: summary
props.description: Content shown in the summary/trigger area

props.name: onToggle
props.description: Callback when the open state changes

accessibility.guideline: Uses native HTML details/summary for built-in accessibility
Keyboard accessible with Enter and Space keys
Summary element is focusable and announced as expandable
